recipes.name: Kung Pao Shrimp
instructions: Marinate shrimp with soy sauce and cornstarch for 10 minutes.
Stir-fry peanuts, chili peppers, and garlic in oil.
Add shrimp and cook until pink.
Add sauce (soy, vinegar, sugar) and simmer until thick.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.

recipes.name: Mexican Chicken
instructions: Season chicken with cumin, chili powder, and salt.
Sear the chicken in a hot skillet until browned.
Add chopped tomatoes, onions, and garlic.
Simmer for 25 minutes until chicken is cooked through.
Serve with rice or warm tortillas.
